main event: A UFO sighting was reported over Hutchinson, Kansas on January 21-22, 1955, involving observations of a bright white light and a red light.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes,The object exhibited hovering behavior and rapid speeds without any visible exhaust or trail,Personnel at the aircraft control tower and several civilians were witnesses to the event,The object was observed changing course and then was lost in the distance,It was concluded that the object was unidentified but possibly a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: a bright white light and a red light
witness description: Civilians and military personnel, including control tower operators at Hutchinson Municipal Airport.
